page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS LIVINGSTON
page.content: The pupils and staff of{Bankton and {Bellsquarry Primary Schools}would like to thank everyone who helped to make this project a success. In particular Mr W.Turnbull, Livingston Development Corporation for maps and historical references, Mr H.Russell, Murieston Castle Farm, Management and Staff at Brucefield Ind. Estate, Crofthead Community Centre Leader, each for their time and patient consideration, Lothian Water and Drainage Board for permission to visit Morton Reservoir, in particular Mr Hewitt, Mr Dott, Teacher Naturalist, Lothian Courier for 'cuttings' which helped us write about Livingston Railway Station, WPC Conway of Lothian and Borders Police, Road Safety Department for supplying us with accident figures, Lord Morton for permission to go on to his land, residents who answered questionnaires.
